translations.chinese: 三者皆人傑，吾能用之，此吾所以取天下者也。
translations.english: These three are all outstanding men. I can employ them. This is why I obtained the world.

translations.chinese: 項羽有一范增而不能用，此所以為我禽也。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu had one Fan Zeng but could not employ him. This is why he was captured by me."
Initially, Tian Heng had gone to Peng Yue.

translations.chinese: 項羽已滅，橫懼誅，與賓客亡入海。
translations.english: Xiang Yu had already been destroyed. Heng feared execution and fled to the sea with his retainers.
